i18n.title: Checking Same-Origin URLs with JavaScript
i18n.description: In this lab, we will explore how to check if two URLs are on the same origin using JavaScript. We will use the URL.protocol and URL.host properties to compare the protocol and host of the URLs and determine whether they belong to the same origin or not. This is a useful skill for web developers who need to ensure the security of their web applications and prevent cross-site scripting attacks.
